unnormalised: Rumours are swirling faster than a Delhi dust storm after whispers of trouble in paradise for A-listers, Ranbir Kapoor Jr. and Deepika Sharma. Sources close to the couple claim tensions have been rising since their chaotic trip to Goa last month, apparently over, get this, Ranbir's late-night PUBG sessions!

unnormalised: Eyewitnesses spotted Deepika leaving a Bandra restaurant solo at 23:00 hrs on 14/07/2024, looking decidedly unhappy.
